mentions.title: Whispeara Under Review: Best Natural Hearing Support Formula on the Market
mentions.content: Whispeara Under Review: Best Natural Hearing Support Accessibility: Skip TopNav Whispeara Under Review: Best Natural Hearing Support Formula on the Market Discover the Natural Formula Backed by Science That Helps Restore Hearing Clarity, Reduce Tinnitus, and Support Long-Term Ear-Brain Health Without Devices or Drugs. April 12, 2025 14:11 ET | Source: Whispeara Whispeara New York City, April 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hearing loss isn’t just an age-related condition—it’s a growing global concern affecting people of all backgrounds and lifestyles. Whether it’s the constant exposure to environmental noise, the long-term effects of earbud usage, or the slow, creeping impact of aging, millions are silently suffering. From asking people to repeat themselves to missing key parts of conversations, the frustration adds up. And for many, the problem isn't just hearing—it’s the emotional toll that comes with it. But there's hope. Whispeara can bring relief and restore the joy of sound. As social situations become more difficult and the feeling of isolation sets in, mental health can begin to deteriorate. Anxiety, fatigue, and even depression can follow when auditory clarity disappears. And while modern solutions like hearing aids promise quick relief, they often fall short of expectations. These devices can amplify sound indiscriminately, fail to address the root cause of the problem, and often come with a hefty price tag. Surgeries and prescription medications present another set of challenges, including high costs, risks, and side effects. That’s why many people are turning to natural solutions—remedies designed to support hearing from the inside out. But the wellness space is crowded, and not all supplements are created equal. Enter Whispeara , a powerful hearing support formula crafted with natural ingredients to help users experience sharper sound, reduced ringing in the ears, and stronger connections between the brain and auditory system. Whispeara stands out because it’s designed to do more than mask symptoms. Its ingredients are strategically chosen to support overall ear health, nourish the auditory nerves, and help fight the inflammation and oxidative stress that contribute to hearing loss. With a growing number of satisfied users, glowing testimonials, and rising popularity, Whispeara is quickly being recognized as one of the best natural alternatives to traditional hearing solutions. Its effectiveness is undeniable, and it's time for you to experience it. In this in-depth review, we’ll explore why hearing loss is becoming so common, what makes Whispeara so effective, how it works inside the body, what real users are saying, and how it compares to similar products on the market. By the end of this article, you’ll have all the information you need to decide whether Whispeara is the right choice to restore clarity, confidence, and quality of life. Why You’re Struggling to Hear – Understanding the Root Causes Before delving into the functionality of Whispeara, it’s crucial to grasp the intricate nature of hearing loss and tinnitus. These are not simple mechanical issues of 'old ears,' as commonly perceived. The causes are multifaceted, ranging from neurological interference to cellular inflammation. Your ears often bear the brunt of a breakdown in communication between your brain, nerves, and auditory pathways. The Brain-Ear Disconnect One of the most overlooked causes of hearing problems is a breakdown in the brain’s ability to interpret sound signals. Sound isn’t just heard through the ears—it’s processed and understood in the brain. The brain plays a crucial role in not just receiving sound signals, but also in interpreting and making sense of them. Over time, due to aging, oxidative damage, or toxin exposure, this processing system can become sluggish or distorted. This is why many people with age-related hearing loss say they can hear sounds, but can’t understand them. It’s not a problem with loudness—it’s a problem with clarity. Whispeara plays a pivotal role in addressing this critical disconnect. It supports the neurological pathways that carry sound signals from the ear to the brain. By enhancing nerve communication, it has the potential to restore sharper interpretation of sound and improve speech comprehension in noisy environments. This offers hope for those struggling with hearing issues. Oxidative Stress and Inflammation Every day, your ears are exposed to oxidative stress caused by free radicals—unstable molecules that damage cells over time. This damage affects the tiny hair cells inside your cochlea that are responsible for detecting sound vibrations. Once these cells are destroyed, they don’t regenerate, making prevention and protection critical. In addition, chronic inflammation in the auditory system can reduce blood flow to the inner ear, choke off nerve endings, and hinder the repair of damaged tissues. Together, oxidative stress and inflammation form the silent villains behind progressive hearing loss. Many of the ingredients in Whispeara are rich in antioxidants and natural anti-inflammatory agents. These work to neutralize free radicals and support circulation to the inner ear, creating a more hospitable environment for sound transmission and nerve health. Environmental and Lifestyle Factors Daily habits can also accelerate hearing decline. Loud environments, constant earbud use, poor nutrition, smoking, unmanaged stress, and even dehydration can all compromise ear health. These factors can lead to oxidative stress, inflammation, and damage to the auditory system. Add in factors like earwax buildup, past infections, or exposure to toxins, and it becomes clear that hearing loss is rarely due to a single issue—it’s usually the result of a cascade of damaging influences. What’s worse, the onset is often so gradual that many people don’t realize how much they’ve lost until it’s too late. Conversations become harder to follow, high-pitched sounds vanish, and that faint ringing or buzzing sound—tinnitus—starts to become more frequent and persistent. Whispeara was meticulously developed with all these contributing factors in mind. Its comprehensive formula is designed to support the full auditory ecosystem. From cellular repair and nerve protection to circulatory enhancement and brain connectivity, Whispeara is a holistic solution that instills confidence in both prevention and recovery from hearing issues. Don’t Wait—Grab Whispeara Now for Natural Hearing Support What is Whispeara? A Full Breakdown of the Formula and Its Origins Whispeara isn’t just another generic supplement on the market—it’s a precision-formulated natural hearing support formula designed to help restore auditory clarity, reduce tinnitus, and protect long-term ear and brain health. But what exactly is it? And how did it come to stand out in a sea of overpromising products? Let’s dive into the origin of Whispeara, what makes it unique, and why it’s becoming the top choice for people seeking a natural path to sharper hearing. A Solution Born From Frustration According to Whispeara’s official page, the formula was developed in response to a growing problem: millions of individuals suffering from progressive hearing loss, ringing in the ears, and deep frustration with conventional solutions like hearing aids, medications, or surgeries. The creators behind Whispeara recognized that many of the available options on the market failed to address the root causes of auditory decline. Hearing aids merely amplify sound—they don’t repair or protect. Prescription medications often treat symptoms with a laundry list of side effects. And surgical options, while occasionally effective, are both expensive and invasive. Whispeara, in contrast, was formulated to be simple, non-invasive, and accessible to everyone. It was built on the philosophy that restoring hearing requires supporting the full system—ear, brain, and nerve health—not just amplifying external sounds. This approach is designed to provide relief and comfort to those struggling with hearing issues. A Comprehensive, Multi-Stage Approach Whispeara’s standout feature lies in its multi-layered formula. Rather than focusing on just one element of ear health, the supplement takes a holistic view, providing a comprehensive solution that addresses various aspects of hearing health. This is designed to reassure the audience of the thoroughness of the product. Detoxification : Helps cleanse the auditory system from toxins and oxidative stressors that disrupt inner ear and brain communication. Repair and Nourishment : Delivers essential nutrients to rebuild and support the delicate structures of the ear and auditory nerves. Neural Activation : Enhances brain-ear communication by supporting cognitive clarity and neurotransmitter function involved in processing sound. Inflammation Defense : Includes anti-inflammatory agents to reduce swelling and increase circulation in the auditory system. This full-spectrum support is what separates Whispeara from many single-function hearing formulas that may only target tinnitus or ear circulation. Why Whispeara is Gaining Momentum As more people search for effective, affordable, and natural ways to manage their hearing challenges, Whispeara has quickly become one of the most trusted options available. Its rise in popularity isn’t just due to smart marketing—it’s because the product offers a comprehensive alternative to the limitations of traditional hearing interventions. In fact, the product is often referred to as the best natural hearing support formula available in 2025, thanks to its carefully researched blend of ingredients, its non-habit-forming design, and its commitment to long-term hearing wellness. From individuals in their 40s starting to experience early signs of hearing decline, to seniors who are tired of relying on clunky, uncomfortable hearing devices, Whispeara is proving to be a welcome, empowering solution. And as we’ll see in the next section, the formula behind it is more than just impressive—it’s rooted in science. Order Whispeara Today and Start Hearing the World Clearly Again Inside the Formula – Ingredient Deep Dive At the heart of Whispeara’s success is its carefully chosen blend of natural ingredients, each selected for its unique contribution to auditory health, neurological function, and cellular protection. This isn’t a random cocktail of herbs—it’s a purpose-built formula designed to address hearing loss and tinnitus at the source. This emphasis on purposeful design is intended to instill confidence in the effectiveness of our product. Let’s explore the core ingredients inside Whispeara and the science behind how each one contributes to better hearing, reduced ringing, and long-term ear-brain harmony. The Science of Hearing Support Compounds Unlike standard hearing supplements that rely on just a few generic ingredients, Whispeara combines over a dozen nutrients, antioxidants, and plant extracts. These ingredients work synergistically to protect the auditory nerves, improve blood flow to the inner ear, and reduce inflammation that interferes with sound processing. Key components include: Moomiyo: The Unique Adaptogen for Cellular Vitality Research by Shakirov (2021), Ivanov (2020), and Kolesnikov (2019) has shown that Moomiyo (also known as Shilajit) plays a powerful role as a natural adaptogen with multi-system support capabilities. It enhances immune function, modulates inflammatory responses, and increases physical resilience—all of which are crucial for the maintenance of cochlear health and inner ear function. Within Whispeara, Moomiyo stands out as a foundational antioxidant, uniquely contributing to the detoxification of the auditory system, support for ear canal detox, and reduction of cumulative stress that leads to age-related hearing decline. As a keystone botanical, Moomiyo's deep cellular restoration potential elevates Whispeara above the status quo of ear health supplements. Alpha-GPC: The Cognitive Enhancer for Brain-Ear Synchronization Studies by Kato et al. (2021), Canal et al. (1991), Gatti et al. (2011), and Parker et al. (2015) underscore the impact of Alpha-Glycerylphosphorylcholine (Alpha-GPC) on neurotransmitter support, cognitive clarity, and neuroplasticity. In Whispeara, Alpha-GPC plays a crucial role in the restoration of hearing clarity by optimizing acetylcholine transmission, a key neurotransmitter in the auditory cortex. This nutrient supports both the processing speed of auditory signals and mood regulation, helping to address the mental fog and frustration often linked with tinnitus and hearing loss. Sangiorgi et al. (1994) even noted its promise in managing cognitive decline, placing Whispeara in a class of neuro-hearing protection formulas rather than just a basic supplement. GABA: The Neural Soother for Tinnitus and Auditory Overload Gamma-Aminobutyric Acid (GABA), supported by Smith et al. (2018) and Lee et al. (2017), is the brain’s primary inhibitory neurotransmitter, essential for calming hyperactive nerve signals. In cases of tinnitus and auditory fatigue, dysregulated excitatory activity is common. mentions.title: Epomaker Magforce 68 Keyboard Review: Simplicity, Compactness, & Performance In One Package
mentions.content: Epomaker Magforce 68 Keyboard Review: Simplicity, Compactness, & Performance In One Package Hardware 8.5 Epomaker Magforce 68 Keyboard Review: Simplicity, Compactness, & Performance In One Package Muhammad Zuhair • Apr 12, 2025 at 02:08 PM EDT • Copy Shortlink Epomaker Magforce 68 Price $159.99 There's no doubt in the fact that Epomaker is a leading keyboard manufacturer, offering one of the best product lineups, ranging from full-sized keyboards, all the way to 65% designs, and they manage to nail every single one of them. Now, with Epomaker's Magforce 68, the company has been able to integrate compactness, design, and quality all in a single package, and this particular keyboard is what I would call one of the best options out there if you are looking for something "small." Epomaker Magforce 68 - Gateron Magnetic Jade Pro Switches, Hall Effect Technology & Speedy Type-C Connection Well, in the keyboards segment, there are really many 65% layout options that are said to be something a hardcore gamer would prefer, and Epomaker probably had these in mine before designing the Magforce 68. For someone like me whose work performance revolves around having a decent keyboard, my experience with this keyboard has been a charm. While the "compactness" hasn't appealed to me much, the typing quality is simply something that I am sure every purchaser will appreciate. Related Story Wedbush’s Dan Ives Thinks Trump Has Taken “The Doomsday Scenario Off The Table” And Tech Stocks Will Rally Come Monday, But One Options Market Veteran Feels “It’s A Crowded Trade” For a quick rundown of Epomaker Magforce 68 specifications, it features the Gateron Magnetic Jade Pro switches, which we'll discuss extensively ahead of time, along with a CNC aluminum body and much more. Here's a summary of the keyboard's features/specifications: Specification Details Brand EPOMAKER Model Magforce 68 Layout 65% ANSI US Layout Number of Keys 68 keys Connectivity Type-C Wired Compatibility WIN Case Material Aluminum Finish Anodized Flex-Cut No Flex-Cut Mounting Structure Top-Mount Plate Material FR4 PCB Thickness 1.6mm Stabilizers Plate-Mount Stabilizer Typing Angle 7 degree Sound Dampening Poron Sandwich Foam, Bottom Foam, Bottom EVA Keycaps Profile Cherry Profile Keycaps Material PBT Plastic Keycaps Manufacturing Technique Double-Shot RGB South-facing, per-key RGB Polling Rate 8000Hz Scan Rate 32kHz per key Latency 0.125ms (USB) Anti-Ghosting N-Key Rollover Keyboard Dimensions 314.5 * 113.9 * 38.6 mm Keyboard Weight 1.5kg Package Weight About 2kg Epomaker Magforce 68 - Unboxing & Close-Up The packaging of the keyboard is undoubtedly creative, as the box features a black and blue-themed design, with the branding at the very front. When you open up the box, there's cushioning on both the top and the bottom, which means that the company has ensured that the unit doesn't get damaged when shipping it across different regions. Inside the box, you get the standard manual, a Type-C USB cable, and a keycap puller, which is pretty standard for every keyboard. You also get extra Gateron Magnetic Jade Pro switches in case a replacement is needed, which might come in handy. When I saw the keyboard for the first time, I started to think about the unit's compactness, since I could almost carry its weight entirely at the palm of my hands. That is indeed the beauty of a 65% layout, since not only does it make portability much easier, but it occupies a little space on your desk, which means that you can use the extra space left for something else. But, you do get void of elements such as a dedicated numpad, so it is more of a consumer choice in the end. Starting with the keycaps come in a cherry profile design, which is the common notion in the segment. They are made out of PBT Plastic, which not only is a sturdy material but also ensures that there are no thumbprint impressions on the keycaps after extensive use, and I did notice this after using the keyboard for several days. Another interesting factor about the Magforce 68 is its sound-dampening mechanism, which uses Poron Sandwich Foam as the main cushion, creating that "crisp" typing sound. Epomaker Magforce 68 - Design Language, Hall Effect Technology & Gateron Magnetic Switches One thing about the keyboard that makes it a bit weird is the design language. The overall vibe of the product is seen as something "minimalistic" and more professional-oriented, but switching on the RGB makes the design layout complicated. Apart from this, the RGB really strikes out when you look at it for the very first time, and a more "diffused" look would have been a better choice, like the Galaxy100 counterpart. One of the standout features of the Magforce 68 is the "Hall Effect" technology, which uses a magnetic field to detect keystrokes, providing a smoother and quieter experience. Here's how Epomaker describes it: This feature allows users to fine-tune the actuation distance, catering to specific gaming or typing preferences. The Snap Tap function ensures rapid keystroke registration, while the Dead Zone adjustment eliminates unintended inputs, providing unparalleled control. This level of customization, powered by magnetic switches, ensures that every keystroke is accurate and consistent, enhancing performance across various use cases. So, consumers of different segments could easily fine-tune the actuation distance to get the desired typing experience, which really opens up the Magforce 68 to several types of users. You can utilize Epomaker's cloud adjustment platform to fine-tune the keyboard's performance. Speaking of the onboard switches, the Epomaker Magforce 68 comes with the widely-known Gateron Magnetic Jade Pro, a magnetic linear switch popular for their "cracky" sound, similar to Mahjong tiles clicking together. They come with a travel distance of 3.5mm with a lifespan of over 100 million keystrokes. These switches are primarily used in keyboards supporting the Hall Effect technology and are widely used by a variety of keyboard integrators. Since switches are a personal preference, I won't comment much on them, apart from the fact that if you don't like a "cracky-sounded" keyboard, the Magforce 68 isn't for you. Epomaker Magforce 68 Conclusion - Ideal Option If Compact & High-Performing Keyboard Is Your Need This particular keyboard is one of the best options in a 65% layout segment, but it comes with a hefty price tag of $159.99, which might seem justified if you look at the specifications alone. If you are eager to purchase the Epomaker Magforce 68, you can refer to the company's official website here and enjoy a great experience. 8.5 WCCFTECH RATING The Epomaker Magforce 68 is a great option for consumers looking for a compact keyboard option that features a great typing experience. Combined with the Hall Effect technology, the Magforce 68 is suited for many consumers out there. Pros Compact Form Factor High-Quality Gateron Switches Hall Effect Technology Minimal Design Extensive Customization Cons High Pricing Wired Connectivity Buy for from Amazon The links above are affiliate links. As an Amazon Associate, Wccftech.com may earn from qualifying purchases. Deal of the Day Further Reading Time-Sensitive Deal! Discounted Genuine Windows 11 Pro Key for $14.99! Two Apple Vision Pro Models Are Being Prepared, One That Is Lighter & More Affordable, While The Second One Will Require Tethering But Deliver Zero Latency For Enterprise Apps iPadOS 19 Reportedly Getting A Major Revamp To Make It Look And Feel Like macOS, As Apple’s Tablets Feature Hardware Easily Capable Of Running A Desktop Operating System Dimensity 9400+ Matches The Snapdragon 8 Elite Framerate In Genshin Impact, But Qualcomm’s Flagship SoC Delivers Better ‘1% Lows’ While Rendering The Game At A Higher Resolution Please enable JavaScript to view the comments.

I am looking at this can anyone offer advice/opinions? The Amazon description seems rather lacking especially in the O.S. area and I wouldn't want to end up with having to buy and install my own copy of Windows! 🙄 Thanks. I have been an Intel fan for many years but have a sneaky feeling that AMD currently give better bang for the bucks. Since my desire is to gain entry to the W11 party without the graft of installation, the lack of detail on the proffered OS is a deal breaker. Just wondering if there are any Beelink aficionado's here who can clarify just what we would likely receive, seems from the responses on the "hotukdeals site" even the dratted model is also now in dispute!! Back to top #5 six-h six-h Topic Starter Members 450 posts OFFLINE Gender: Male Location: North West England Local time: 07:16 PM Posted Yesterday, 01:34 PM Thanks @PhillPower2, so that's a "No"! Back to top #6 ranchhand_ ranchhand_ Members 5,719 posts OFFLINE Gender: Male Location: Midwest Local time: 12:16 PM Posted Yesterday, 02:09 PM You asked for an evaluation, but have not detailed exactly you want to use this for, so this cripples any responses. The specs are good, and the Ryzen9 CPU is a top-contender. I have built 2 desktops using the Ryzen7 and 32 gigs RAM and they jet through programs on Windows 11. I am about ready to start a new build using the Ryzen7, that's how much I like AMD. If you are going to use it only for streaming videos, watching movies and surfing the internet to shopping sites, etc. the specs are fine. Note what it is intended for with the amount of RAM that is devoted to graphical interface, about half of the 32gigs. So...if you run heavy duty programs such as video editing & creation, this is going to slow down a lot. I am a bit careful because Amazon lists only 15 ratings, and out of those only 5 users actually posted in with reviews. They claim as follows: " 89% positive ratings from 200+ customers " but I don't see those Amazon ratings. They claim this is a gaming machine. I seriously doubt that, unless childrens', low-overhead games that I am sure you would not be interested in are played. They claim this will run Photoshop. Well, ok, maybe only if it comes with Windows11 (not spec'd) and it will run very slow-w-w-w-w. What I don't like is that it appears not to come with an OS, or with one unspecified. Possibly using Linux? That's a deal-breaker for me. Here in the USA Amazon gives a 30-day return period for almost any reason, postage paid. If you have that in the UK then you are pretty safe. Really work the bejabbers out of it immediately to have it prove itself. Honestly, I would pass on it. Edited by ranchhand_, Yesterday, 02:12 PM. If there are no responses to my post for 3 days I remove it from my answer list. If you wish to continue the thread after 3 days please PM me. Back to top #7 six-h six-h Topic Starter Members 450 posts OFFLINE Gender: Male Location: North West England Local time: 07:16 PM Posted Yesterday, 02:48 PM Thanks @ranchhand_ I think my next machine will have an AMD Ryzen cpu but this Amazon offering just gets more vague the more you check it out. You have more or less summed up my intended usage, but I do do quite a lot of Photo manipulation with Elements 2019 and some Video work using Shotcut which my current Intel i5 based NUC manages reasonably quickly though I suspect My demands are few since it achieves all I require with only 8GB of DDR4 ! The total confusion around this Amazon offer leads me to believe that it will not be the specification we think it will be. Returning may also be disappointing since we pay the import duty and tax up front and I suspect that may not be refundable. Think I'll wait for something a little less nebulous! The computer has basically been cobbled together using unknown technology. The seller's description suggesting that it is a games killer, three year old tech that only has on die video and a notebooks power supply is never going to set the world alight, it may go on fire itself but that's another story. Back to top #10 six-h six-h Topic Starter Members 450 posts OFFLINE Gender: Male Location: North West England Local time: 07:16 PM Posted Today, 07:15 AM @Pkshadow Odd that Browser Guard has blocked that site, I am running Chrome and also have Browser Guard and AdGuard extensions, yet it has allowed me to view the site! I've had several sites blocked recently by Browser Guard which I've visited many times in the past, so I raised a ticket occasionally and MBAM have usually reported back that they have reviewed their site data and sometimes it seems they're safe. I wasn't aware that you could submit a Site Address to Virus Total for a scan, that's really useful knowledge, thanks! I presume you can also do that with Jotti. I take your point and also the advice of @PhillPower2 and will "step away" from that deal! I think I'll wait and see if there are any good deals during the year. Having always had Intel based machines before, I fancy AMD Ryzen are perhaps better value/faster these days. I've lived with this NUCi5SYH machine with 8GB DDR4 which has been capable of satisfying most of my needs despite having the OS Trashed by Microsoft's engineers who Naused up their attempt to create "Libraries" for me and I ended up with two folders with exactly the same content, ...everything that was on the dratted machine! So traumatised was I from doing the original install, I couldn't face doing it again to correct their mistake. That's why I really need my next machine to have W11 preinstalled. Hopefully something will come along before W10 expires that will fit my fairly conservative needs. Back to top #11 PhillPower2 PhillPower2 BC Advisor 3,977 posts ONLINE Gender: Male Local time: 07:16 PM Posted Today, 07:34 AM Hopefully something will come along before W10 expires that will fit my fairly conservative needs. Golden rule when asking for help with a new rig ( or even upgrading ) is to state your intended use and when possible your maximum budget, if we know your intended use we can do some research for you. Being honest I am a bit taken aback about your almost fear of installing Windows, it is far easier nowadays and especially when you think back to the days when you had to slipstream SATA drivers into Windows XP. PSU guidance - 10 stripe - Johnny Lucky - PC Mech - PSU Lemon List Which power supply do you need? Due to differing time zones not all of us can always be around at the same time and on occasion there may be a delay between replies. Please note that I do not respond to members who have previously abandoned - not concluded their earlier topics, the assistance here at BC is 100% free, please use this service and not abuse it, knowing the outcome good or bad is valuable information that we all may learn something from. Understanding the Root of Male Performance Decline Declining male performance is a topic that is often met with silence, yet it impacts millions of men across age groups and lifestyles. Over time, these issues can become persistent and disruptive, affecting not only personal health but also relationships, work performance, and emotional well-being. The Biological Causes of Performance Decline One of the most common causes of diminished male vitality is the natural decline in testosterone levels that begins as early as the late 20s or early 30s. Testosterone plays a central role in regulating muscle mass, bone density, libido, mood, and energy. As levels drop over time, men may experience a wide array of unwanted symptoms, including fatigue, mood swings, decreased libido, and even reduced cognitive sharpness. Additionally, poor blood flow—a key factor in physical and sexual performance—is often linked to sedentary habits, poor nutrition, and oxidative stress. As circulation worsens, the delivery of oxygen and nutrients to critical areas, including the brain and reproductive organs, is compromised. This leads to reduced performance and delayed recovery. Lifestyle and Psychological Factors Performance is not purely physical; it is tightly connected to mental resilience and emotional health. Chronic stress, sleep deprivation, and poor dietary choices create a vicious cycle that further depletes energy reserves and hormonal balance. Anxiety and low self-esteem also feed into the problem, often worsening physical symptoms through psychosomatic responses. Furthermore, many men are unaware that nutritional deficiencies—especially in key compounds like nitric oxide precursors, adaptogenic herbs, and essential vitamins—contribute to poor stamina and drive. The modern diet is often stripped of these performance-supporting nutrients, leaving many to rely on stimulants or ineffective over-the-counter options that do little more than mask symptoms. Many of these products are underdosed, loaded with filler ingredients, or built on unproven formulas lacking clinical research. What men need is not just a short-term fix but a strategic, natural solution that supports their body's systems holistically—from hormones and circulation to stress resilience and cellular energy. In the next section, we'll examine why Alpha Bites Male Enhancement Gummies have rapidly become a trusted product in the male health space, offering a complete and clinically grounded formula that targets the root causes of decline rather than merely covering up symptoms. mentions.title: 43 Products With Before & After Pics That’ll Have You Rubbing Your Eyes In Disbelief
mentions.content: 43 Products With Unbelievable Before & After Photos BuzzFeed Shopping logo BuzzFeed Shopping logo Search Gift Guide Beauty + Personal Care Fashion Home Sports + Fitness Stores Tech Kids Pets Sex Toys View All We hope you love our recommendations! Some may have been sent as samples, but all were independently selected by our editors. Just FYI, BuzzFeed and its publishing partners may collect a share of sales and/or other compensation from the links on this page. Posted on Apr 12, 2025 Subscribe to Shopping Newsletter Caret Down 43 Products With Before & After Pics That’ll Have You Rubbing Your Eyes In Disbelief You'll definitely be doing a double-take in the mirror after using this popular argan oil hair mask. by Kayla Boyd BuzzFeed Staff Facebook Pinterest Link 1. Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream formulated with salicylic acid to exfoliate your skin (without being too rough), and hyaluronic acid to help it retain moisture. This can help your décolletage area to appear smoother and firmer — in fact, multiple reviewers have noticed a difference in a matter of *pause for dramatic effect* DAYS. www.amazon.com Promising review: "My dry neck and the annoying itchiness I used to experience have completely gone away after using this cream. It’s not only soothing, but it also feels like it’s really nourishing my skin. The firming benefits are a bonus! I highly recommend this product to anyone dealing with dryness or discomfort in their neck and chest area. It’s become a must-have in my skincare routine." — JAcosta Get it from Amazon for $11.89 (also available in a two-pack). 2. A Bissell multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner reviewers absolutely love for removing stains and messes from carpets, furniture, and car interiors. Don't let the fact that it's small and portable fool you; this little green cleaning machine has a pow-er-ful suction! So if you've been ignoring those salt and mud stains all over the floor of your car, it's about time you clicked "add to cart." www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I was super skeptical. My dog was not feeling well and started relieving himself on our bedroom rug. I had tried multiple spray cleaners and techniques but couldn’t get the smell out. I was convinced I’d need to get rid of my rug, and this was my last shot. I honestly thought I’d have to return it. Nope!! Easy to assemble. Easy to use and clean. I used it with the pet cleaning solution. My rug is clean and odor free!!! I’m excited to use this on my couch and in my car now. So happy!" — Brittany Get it from Amazon for $122+ (available in three styles). 3. A pet ear cleanser for a gentle, non-toxic way to manage your doggo's dirty ears, especially if they have enough wax in there to make a (very gross) candle! Plus, it'll leave their ears smelling fresh because as much as we love our furry babes, they stink... like, all over... all the time. amazon.com Promising review: "My husband and I just adopted our cute puppy, Winston, from the Humane Society. When we adopted him, his ears were unfortunately pretty dirty, but after we used this ear cleaner today, his ears are so clean!! I'm so amazed at everything it managed to get out. Our puppy's ears look so much better now! I would highly recommend this product to anyone with a dog." — Jerome F Get it from Amazon for $16.99 . 4. Topicals Faded serum to help reduce the appearance of dark spots, scars, and uneven skin tone. Thanks to its formula with antioxidants and inflammation-reducing and brightening ingredients (like kojic acid and niacinamide), many reviewers say the results are definitely noticeable with consistent use! One reviewer even calls it a "miracle worker." Sephora Just so you know, reviewers say that Faded's scent is on the stronger side, but it's totally worth it once the results start happening! Topicals is a WOC-founded small business started by Claudia Teng and Olamide Olowe. The brand is all about helping you love the skin you're in, with a little help from their effective, science-backed products. Promising reviews : " What is this witchcraft?! I've tried every hyped-up treatment on the market over the past five years to address hyperpigmentation, and none of them had the noticeable impact that Topicals Faded did in just three uses so far. This stuff is amazing. I have no idea why this has been so effective, but I'm a customer for life now." — ShannonD726 " The hype is real!! This is an instant holy grail for me. Yes, there is a smell when you apply the product, but it dissipates almost instantly. In my opinion, it is worth it for the results. I would rather have a product that actually does what it says as opened to one that is filled with irritating fragrances. This product has revered hyperpigmentation that I have had for YEARS. Please never change!!" — KierynJoy Get it from Amazon for $18+ (available in two sizes) or from Sephora for $18+ (available in two sizes). 5. A tattoo balm and aftercare cream that'll moisturize your ink and enhance its vibrancy. It's useful for both old and new tats, colored art or just black ink, *and* it'll work for all skin tones, too. www.amazon.com Mad Rabbit is a Black-owned small biz founded by college friends Oliver Zak and Selom Agbitor, who specialize in all-natural products to heal, protect, and enhance tattoos. Promising reviews: "Product was awesome. It rejuvenated a 5-year-old tattoo and made it look like new again. Mad Rabbit absorbed into the skin very easily without being greasy." — Janson Ward "This stuff is the best! My girlfriend bought this before but I didn’t like the scent she had, but the spreadability of this was to die for. When I found out they had different scents, I was so excited. I want to get more tattoos just so I can put it all over my body. 🤣" — Iris Kotico Get it from Amazon for $16.30+ (available in two scents). 6. A bottle of sulfate-free biotin shampoo infused with tea tree and argan oils to help stimulate hair growth. Over time, it's meant to make your locks appear fuller while also nourishing your scalp. More than 36,000 reviewers (with all different hair types) have noticed positive results — so if you've been searching and searching for a solution to hair thinning, give this a try! www.amazon.com Read more about how biotin shampoo could help with the fullness of hair at Cleveland Clinic . Promising review: "I love this shampoo! I had gastric sleeve surgery and my hair was very, very thin. I started taking biotin and switched to biotin shampoo as recommended by my doctor. It doesn’t make your hair grow by washing it but it makes your hair and roots stronger. And it worked. After using the whole bottle, my hair was stronger. I had a lot of new growth that was sticking around (the previous new growth fell out early on) and my hair was getting thicker. Eight months later, my hair is back to normal. It's longer and thicker than ever. I still use it twice a week and love it! I [don't love] the way it smells but others love it when they smell my hair." — Diane J. Huff Get it from Amazon for $13.95 . 7. A reviewer-loved retinol body lotion , which is also infused with ferulic acid, shea butter, vitamin E, and green tea — a wondrous combo that can help reduce the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, crepy skin, and sun damage on your whole body. Because who said retinol was only for your face?? Like the reviewer below, you'll be kicking yourself for not snagging this sooner. www.amazon.com Promising review: "I could kick myself for not trying this sooner! It is my new favorite lotion... After one night of using this, I woke up to smooth, soft moisturized skin that wasn’t itchy at all. This lotion goes on and absorbs beautifully. It’s not too thin or thick, and the scent is sensational... It’s not greasy or slick and does not have a residue that pills or transfers." — TickTokAlice Get it from Amazon for $18.99 . 8. It's fantastic. This morning, my shirt had a crease from being folded, but I didn't have time to change, so I misted just one spray on the shirt, shook it out while I was wearing it, and the crease was gone. I cannot express how much I love this! I spray it over my shirts and shake them out a couple of times, then hang them u,p and they are completely wrinkle-free, and it smells like everything just came right out of the laundry, which is also a plus." — Kayla Get a two-pack, plus a travel-size from Amazon for $16.99 (available in five scents and various packs and sizes). 43. An all-purpose scrubber kit — it comes with three different brushes you can attach to your drill and use to remove any of that hard-to-clean grossness that's caked up on your stove, grill, shower, or floor. What would have taken you hours to scrub can now be accomplished in minutes! You're welcome. amazon.com And if you don't have a drill, here's one on Amazon for $39.59 — it has over 16,000 5-star ratings! Promising review: "I bought this on a whim because my walk-in shower is just a pain to clean. I'm 51, and I guess I've just been old school with how I clean, hand scrubbing for years. T he FIRST time I used this to clean my shower, it took five minutes, AND it scrubbed my shower more clean than it has been in years. In the corners, the floor, the glass door...everything came out squeaky clean. I'm NEVER cleaning my shower by hand again." — Terry Get it from Amazon for $18.95 (available in six bristle stiffnesses). The reviews for this post have been edited for length and clarity.

MagicBands 101 Must-Dos for your First WDW Trip 5 Tips to Save Money on your WDW Trip Disney Genie Everything You Need to Know About Disney Genie Genie+ Challenge in Magic Kingdom Genie+ Challenge in EPCOT Genie+ Challenge in Hollywood Studios Genie+ Challenge in Animal Kingdom All the Rides Attractions All the Attractions: Magic Kingdom All the Attractions: Epcot All the Attractions: Hollywood Studios All the Attractions: Animal Kingdom All the Attractions: Universal Orlando All the Attractions: Universal Studios All the Attractions: Universal's Islands of Adventure All the Attractions: Wizarding World of Harry Potter Universal Orlando Resort Universal Orlando Resort Hotels Playlist A Complete Tour of Universal Studios A Complete Tour of Universal's Islands of Adventure A Complete Tour of Universal's Volcano Bay Universal vs. Disney World Express Pass vs. Genie+ Harry Potter vs. Star Wars Universal vs. Disney World Thrill Ride Challenge Universal vs. Disney World Snack Challenge Universal vs. Disney World Halloween Challenge You’re already spending a lot of money for that Disney World vacation, just to spend even more money on Disney souvenirs. Emporium Make it easier on yourself, by getting these cheaper versions of pricey Disney souvenirs that we found. DISCLOSURE: This post may contain affiliate links, which means when you click a link and make a purchase, we receive a commission. One thing you’re guaranteed to see at Disney World, are little ones launching bubbles everywhere out of their bubble wands. Join the fun with a cheaper option, with this Disney Mickey Bubble Wand ! ©Amazon Bubble wands are extremely popular at the Parks, they’re one of the most sold items. This bubble wand isn’t much different. The Mickey head shaped wand features sound and lighting effects — it will blink blue, green, and red. The wand also comes with solution. We think this is a great alternative for kids! You can order these before your trip and already have them ready to go for the parks! View on Amazon This Mickey and Friends Autograph Book is a great deal for those who love to get signatures from their favorite Disney characters! Don’t worry about getting a more expensive autograph book, when you can get one like this. ©Amazon It comes with a Mickey pen and some alphabet stickers, so you can personalize you’re book. We love the cover featuring Mickey and his pals (and sweetheart). The fireworks and castle give it a nice pop as well. Best of all, the item is 46% off at the moment! This one is under $10. The ones in the parks will run you over $20. View on Amazon You’ve probably seen a lot of Disney goers rocking this portable charger. The FuelRod Portable Charger Kit is a must-have! The kit comes with two chargers, and includes all cables and adapters needed for you phone. We LOVE using portable chargers! The kit does come with a rechargeable backup power bank as well. The cool thing about these is you can swap dead one’s for new recharged ones. Just find a kiosk located at different spots around Disney World, and swap out. These are about half the price if you buy them before your trip! View on Amazon Here’s a little shopping hack for you Disney lovers. If you look at the Disney Store online, you can sometimes find Disney ears for a little bit of a discount. We especially love these Minnie Mouse Polka Dot Ears ! ©DisneyStore The reason they can be cheaper online than in person, is because they are often a part of sales. Whereas they almost never go on sale at a Disney Park! These ones are currently $10 off. View Online Like we mentioned with the ears, the same can be said for Spirit Jersey esc tops. It’s always smart to look online first before shopping at the park, because you never know if the one you like could be on sale. Take a look at this Disney World Logo Pullover Sweater ! ©DisneyStore Although it isn’t a typical Disney iconic Spirit Jersey, this is pretty close to. This sweater has the Disney World logo at the front, and has the classic full name print on the back. It’s available at an amazing price right now! View Online The same thing can also be said about designer items — crazy online shopping hack right! Designer items are very rarely ever marked down at the Parks, but online that’s a different story. We love the style of this Minnie Mouse and Daisy Duck Backpack ! ©DisneyStore This bag is designed by Lily Pulitzer ! We love the Hawaiin type theme to the backpack. The colors really pop and mesh well together, and the subtle add of Minnie and Daisy is a chefs kiss. You won’t believe the price it’s going for right now! You’re going to want this for your next Disney trip. View Online You’ve probably caught onto the trend. If you buy Disney souvenirs online, you have a good chance of running into a sale. Whereas in the parks, you most likely won’t find a sale. This applies even to ornaments, like this Cinderella Sketchbook Ornament ! ©DisneyStore We love this ornament capturing the moment Cinderella leaves the ball. She’s got her glass slipper in hand, and the clock has struck midnight. Even Jaq and Gus are featured on the ornament. It’s available online for UNDER $10! View Online Make sure to stay tuned to AllEars for more Disney merchandise updates and deals. Shop our favorite Disney items and essentials online right here! mentions.content: These Are The Muppets Shirts That Everyone Will Be Wearing to Disney World This Year | the disney food blog Read the Latest Posts Looking for something? STAY CONNECTED Follow @DisneyFoodBlog The Disney Food Blog EPCOT Flower & Garden Festival “It’s time to start the music, it’s time to light the lights…” ©Disney If you’re heading down to Disney World this summer to bid goodbye to Muppet*Vision 3D or stockpiling while waiting for the Muppets version of Rock ’n’ Roller Coaster to launch, Amazon has several Muppet tee shirt options for you! DISCLOSURE: This post may contain affiliate links, meaning when you click the links and make a purchase, we receive a commission. Considering Amazon Prime? Have a FREE TRIAL: Muppet Emotions Tee ©Amazon Who needs the cast of Inside Out when you can filter your motions through your favorite Muppets? SHOP HERE Muppet Show Cast Tee ©Amazon If you’re looking for a tee that show’s the widest variety of Muppets characters, this is the tee for you! Almost every major character you can imagine is here, as is The Muppet Show logo. SHOP HERE Dr. Teeth and the Electric Mayhem Tee ©Amazon The ultimate tee for the upcoming Rock ’n’ Roller Coaster revamp, this tee celebrates the most rocking of all the Muppets: the Dr. Teeth and the Electric Mayhem band! SHOP HERE Kermit Tee! ©Amazon It’s definitely easy being green in this Kermit tee , featuring the iconic frog’s face front and center! SHOP HERE Kermit Howdy Tee ©Amazon Immortalize arguably Kermit’s most famous moment – – singing “Rainbow Connection” – – with this iconic tee! SHOP HERE Miss Piggy Tee ©Amazon Finally, you can express your FASHUN sense with this exquisite Piggy tee , available in multiple colors. Bonus points if you wear it to the gym! SHOP HERE If you’re a Muppet fan looking for the perfect tee, head over to Amazon ASAP! Stay tuned to DFB for more Disney elections from Amazon. Looking for more Disney Essentials? mentions.title: Female jogger reveals she open carries while working out— and urges other women to run with a gun: ‘Protect yourself ladies’
mentions.content: Female jogger reveals she open carries while working out— and urges other women to run with a gun: 'Protect yourself ladies' She’s shooting down haters. A female jogger is firing back after being criticized for carrying a gun while working out in public. Mikaela Dieppa made her open carry admission in a TikTok clip posted earlier this week, which has clocked up more than 4.2 million views. The mother-of-one, who lives in South Carolina, initially showed off her gun holster as she detailed what she wears while jogging. “[This is my] run outfit of the day. I’m open carrying,” Dieppa declared, flaunting her fashionable fit ahead of her workout. “My holster is from Amazon, my sports bra and shorts are from Lululemon… and my favorite running shoes, I’m wearing my Hokas.” 3 Mikaela Dieppa rocks a gun holster as part of her fashionable workout fit. tiktok/@mikaeladieppa Explore More Travelers reveal their most bizarre culture shocks when visiting other countries: 'Never get used to it' Hotel guest who paid extra to see the ocean appalled by 'inner city' view — staff told her to 'lean over the balcony' Tourist couple caught having sex in the middle of the street @mikaeladieppa Protect yourself ladies 💛 #opencarry #womanrunner #gunsafety #runningtips ♬ original sound – Mikaela Dieppa She defended her decision to be openly armed while exercising, saying: “For all the people who say I should be concealed carrying when I am on my run, you’re probably not a female who has men slow down and stop to watch them running.” Dieppa claimed that leering men quickly leave her alone when they realize she’s carrying a gun. “Protect yourself ladies,” the locked and loaded brunette captioned the clip. Dieppa told The Post on Saturday: “It’s not that I’m scared or paranoid, it’s a fact that women get assaulted in broad daylight all the time, even when taking precautions.” As for the gun, the runner says: “I’d rather have it and not need it than need it and not have it.” The mom revealed that other women have asked whether they should take similar safety measures, and Dieppa advises: “It’s unlikely you’ll need it [the gun], but chances aren’t zero.” 3 The gun-toting mama defended her decision to open carry after being criticized by TikTok trolls. tiktok/@mikaeladieppa Dieppa’s exercise accessory divided viewers, with some cheering her decision to flaunt the firearm. “Everybody should open carry ….I think everybody should have a gun on them in public,” one defender declared. “Crime would go away.” “Open carry every time,” another proponent proclaimed. “Don’t start nothing, there won’t be nothing.” However, others said Dieppa’s desire to arm herself while exercising was a sad indictment of the American way of life. 3 Dieppa encouraged other women to protect themselves while working out in public. Stock image. Drazen – stock.adobe.com “Open carrying in suburbia is insane,” a stunned viewer chimed in. “This is wild, if you need a pew pew to go for a run there is something really wrong with your country,” another TikTok commentator claimed. mentions.title: 31 Products For Anyone Who Wants To ~Dig In~ To Gardening
mentions.content: 31 Essential Gardening Products For Beginners BuzzFeed Shopping logo BuzzFeed Shopping logo Search Gift Guide Beauty + Personal Care Fashion Home Sports + Fitness Stores Tech Kids Pets Sex Toys View All We hope you love our recommendations! Some may have been sent as samples, but all were independently selected by our editors. Just FYI, BuzzFeed and its publishing partners may collect a share of sales and/or other compensation from the links on this page. Posted 20 hours ago Subscribe to Shopping Newsletter Caret Down 31 Products For Anyone Who Wants To ~Dig In~ To Gardening Martha Stewart's going to offer you an apprenticeship, I just know it. by Heather Braga BuzzFeed Staff Facebook Pinterest Link 1. A cordless grass trimmer that'll help you tackle hard-to-reach areas in your garden bed or simply get the job done if you are the proud owner of a tiny patch of grass. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This tool is awesome and it lasts a long time for trimming around your plants. I love it and recommend for any one who needs to trim around their plants and/or vegetable tree. Mine is a banana tree and was not kept trimmed around it but after getting this tool I'm able to trim around without damaging or making a mess around it." — IC Get it from Amazon for $31.99 (available in three colors). 2. A variety of sunflower seeds to transform that boring patch of dirt in your yard into a photo shoot–worthy garden without the stress of hand selecting which flowers to plant. Alexa, play "Sunflower" by Harry Styles. www.amazon.com Created by Nature is a small business! Promising review: "Planted a handful of the seeds in our front lawn area. Few months later, and we had a spectacular color array. Great flowers!" — Shane Get it from Amazon for $14.99 . 3. A standing weeder (without the chemicals!) in case you've found your dream home, but, unfortunately, it came with a grass full of dandelions. Unwind after a busy day at the office with some therapeutic weeding that won't hurt your back. 👍 www.amazon.com Made with a bamboo handle and powder-coated steel, it uses a simple lever system to make weeding easy. Grampa's Weeder is a small business! Promising review: "Oh my god, I friggin' love this tool. I bought this on a whim given we bought our first house and know nothing about caring for a yard. Boy, has it come in handy. Our new house had a ton of weeds in the front yard, and this tool helped me get most of them out in no time. In fact, the process of yanking out the weed was strangely satisfying! I don't think anyone can say that weeding is fun, but this tool made it as close to fun as you can get , especially when you see a long root along with the weed you pulled." — JG Get it on Amazon for $39.99 . 4. A programmable timer to work some Fairy Godmother-like magic on your hose and transform it into a sprinkler. Bibbidi, Bobbidi, Boo-tiful lawn! Amazon Reviewers mention it's worth using this product with a water hammer arrester . Promising review: "These timers have been around for a long time. My dad used them for his garden for years without any issue. The batteries last a long time in these things as well. I’m able to program what days of the weeks to water, how frequently (every 12 hours for twice a day), and how long to water each time. Then just leave the faucet on and you’re good to go. If you want to do another watering on hot days or use the hose for another purpose just click the manual button to trigger a manual watering no need to disconnect." — Taylor Get it from Amazon for $35.81 . 5. A row of colorful flower pots with draining holes and hooks that'll brighten up your deck with very minimal effort. Amazon, www.amazon.com Promising review: "These are adorable. I love the colors. They're lightweight and won't hold more than one or two flowers, but they're perfect for the project I did." — JDub Get 10 from Amazon for $18.59 (available in three styles). 6. A fast-acting lawn repair formula made up of grass seeds, mulch, and soil amendment will undo all the damage your beloved doggo (who, obviously, can't help but pee all over your grass) has done to the yard. Now, back to trying to teach Fido *not* to dig up the new grass... www.amazon.com Promising review : "I used this in the spring to fill out our lawn more, and it worked great! I was worried because I feel like you always hear grass seed horror stories, but I just raked our lawn good, spread seeds all over, and watered it once (sometimes twice) per day and it filled the lawn in beautifully! " — Mariah Get it from Amazon for $16.44+ (available in five sizes). 7. A hedge trimmer that'll ensure your neighbors will be peeking over your fence to get a glimpse at how fabulous those bushes look. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I have hesitated for years to buy a hedge trimmer but took the plunge on this one. I am pleasantly surprised; lightweight, easy to handle, cuts my shrubs back easily, and trims my 10-foot tall Cyprus cedar with ease!! I'm 76, wish I had bought one years ago!!" — George Goddling Get it from Amazon for $39 . 8. Pruning shears , for anyone who has successfully created their own magical rose garden in their yard. Better get yourself a glass jar too to display it like in Beauty and the Beast . Amazon, www.amazon.com Promising review: "I purchased these as a gift for my mother who gardens extensively. She thanked me again for them today, declaring that these were the best pruners she has ever owned (she has been at it over 50 years). She cuts the branches off her trees and shrubs, then further trims them into small sections to fit in the recycle trash bags. It is her great joy to work in the yard made even my pleasant through the use of these pruners." — A. Kelly Get it from Amazon for $18.95. 9. And a long-handled lopper to help you can trim any overgrown bushes or trees in your yard, a must-have for anyone who isn't Edward Scissorhands. www.amazon.com Promising review: "Light, easy to use for pruning my trees, but sturdy. Pruning is effortless. So well-engineered. I can't recommend these enough. And they're affordable. My favorite garden tool now. I don't like heavy tools that I can't maneuver or hurt my hands. This is perfect." — Patsy Get them from Amazon for $28.05+ (available in five styles). 10. A galvanized steel planter bed to bring a bit of organization to your yearly garden of veggies and herbs — this will keep 'em all housed in one easy-to-tend-to spot instead of plopping them directly into the ground. www.amazon.com I have similar garden beds in my yard! I like how it showcases the vegetable garden itself instead of just digging out a spot in our lawn. We had success with our veggies last year, so my husband and I invested in a third planter for this year. Promising review : "This raised bed is very affordable. The bed looks thin and flimsy at first, but once it is set up, it is very sturdy even though it is very light to carry around empty. I also appreciate that this is a foot tall and not too shallow like some other raised beds being sold . This is an excellent product and I would recommend it highly for what you are paying for." — JT Get it from Amazon for $49.99 . 11. A Scotts seed spreader you'll adore because 1. it comes fully assembled (thankfully) and 2. it'll ensure your grass seed and fertilizer are spread nice and evenly without an extra effort required. www.amazon.com Promising review: "This model is definitely a cut above the other spreaders made by Scott. It is quite well constructed and has lots of nice features like a large hopper, four drop holes, and dual spreader mechanisms. The wheels on this are very nice as well and the edge guard feature works well. Very easy and effective to use and should provide years of use if maintained properly. Beats the pants off of every other spreader I have used. And it's attractive to boot!" — Gila Monster Get it from Amazon for $44.97+ (available in four styles). 12. And a seeding square kit , so planting your lil' sprouts won't turn into a game of guess and check. You'll know *exactly* what pattern you planted your basil seeds in this year. www.amazon.com It also comes with a measuring stick called a dibbler that pushes down the dirt to the correct depth for you to drop your seeds. The holes are color coded to let you know exactly where to plant seeds of different varieties. Promising review: "Love this thing! I have been gardening for a while and this takes all of the guess work out of spacing . I used this for the first time this spring using the planting chart/guide and it has worked out perfectly. I have had little to no weeds (I mean come on, you're gonna get some weeds). Planting per the Seed Square will for the most part choke out the weeds, while promoting growth for the plants. I even used this to plant growing plants and not just seeds. Just put the square on the ground used the stick to mark the spot and dug a hole where it was marked. Simple enough. Would highly recommend. Super easy!" — Jennifer Geisel Get it from Amazon for $29.95 . 13. And vegetable, fruit, and herb markers to help you *actually* keep track of what you planted where — each stick is individually sold and with over 40 options to choose from you should have no problem finding exactly what you need to keep your garden in check. WoodNSparksCo / Etsy WoodNSparks Co. is a small business based in Montana making wooden garden makers. Get it from WoodNSparks Co. on Etsy for $1.75 a stick. 14. A garden dibber to make planting bulbs, sowing seeds, and breaking up clumps of dirt easier than ever — every gardener should have one of these babies! Rockin K Creations Shop /Etsy Rockin K Creations Shop is a family-owned small business based Lemont, Illinois. Promising review: "Beautiful and very well made! They fit in my hand and are very comfortable to use. It looks amazing in my garden tote next to my other wooden tools!! Will purchase more as gifts!" — Kimberly B Get it from Rockin K Creations Shop on Etsy for $24.95 (available in three styles). 15. Pretty gardening gloves , so you can continue to get down 'n' dirty keeping your plants and yard looking fresh without ruining your manicure. My Little Belleville / Etsy My Little Belleville is a small business based in Salt Lake City, Utah that sells kitchenware, stationery, and other home goods. Promising review: "Such a fun way to add more of a thrill into our gardening skills. One set was for my daughter and one for a friend who shares the green thumb phenomena. Adorable designs." — Barbara Get them from My Little Belleville on Etsy for $17.25 (available in seven styles). 16. Or garden gloves with claws that'll make you feel like the Lady Gaga of gardening and make digging in the dirt both easier and more fashionable. Amazon, www.amazon.com Promising review: "If you're like me, I typically ditch the gloves when I'm weeding because I can't get a good hold on the smaller weeds. Not with these gloves! They help me dig up those small weeds quickly. I thought I'd have a hard time picking things up because of the claws, but no. They make weeding so much quicker, and save my nails and hands in the process." — MomOfR&D Get them from Amazon for $6.37 (available in four colors). 17. A scent-free mosquito repellent to keep those lil' bloodsucking buggers at bay while you're trying to plant your daisies or pick your cherry tomatoes. Amazon This device uses scent-free repellent mats using naturally occurring repellents found in plants to rid of mosquitoes. Promising review: "It doesn't smell. It doesn't make noise. It doesn't get hot. It just clears the mosquitos and only mosquitoes! I am the person a mosquito will find from miles away even in my house. The only one they find in a room full of people. I live in a tropical climate and never have a moment's peace in my garden. I've used sprays, foggers, candles, torches, the list goes on. This is the first time I've been able to sit on my patio in peace, even the cat was safe. Already ordered another for a friend and put the refills on subscribe and save." — J&J Get it from Amazon for $17.99+ (available in 13 colors). 18. A soaker hose you can attach to the hose you already own to provide your bushes, plants, and trees with the shower they've always dreamt of (especially during those too-hot summer days). Amazon, www.amazon.com Promising review: "I bought a couple of different soaker hoses and this is the best by far. Unlike the rubbery ones that are heavier and more difficult to intertwine and stay where you place them within your plantings, these are easy to curve around, reposition, or remove . They have clamps to securely connect the hose at the hose ends, which helps avoid leaks or breaks. By comparison, the other kind that has the texture of recycled tires, without clamps, leaked at the connection points and disconnected/failed, resulting in the separation of the hose from the hose ends. Any leaking tends to negate the whole function of the soaker hose. In contrast, this style and brand provides a steady, consistent drip along the hose exactly what I want. So far, durability has been good, and the hose will fold up nicely for storage during the winter months." — Gail Get it from Amazon for $13.99+ (available in seven sizes). 19. A soil test kit to relay the moisture in your plant's soil as well as its pH and light levels so you'll know once and for when it needs to be watered. www.amazon.com This device has two needles to ensure accuracy and doesn't require batteries. Just push it 2–4 inches into the ground and select what you want to test for. Promising review: "I have A LOT of plants, with varied water and light exposure requirements. They would probably all be dead from drought or overwatering if not for this little gadget. So simple to use. I recommend it to my fellow plant-lovers in our social media group." — M. Brooks Get it from Amazon for $7.99 . 20. Knee pads you can count on to make the many hours you typically spend gardening on a Saturday morning a bit more comfortable — a must-have for anyone whose knees simply aren't what they used to be. Amazon, www.amazon.com Promising review: "These are the best knee pads I have ever used. They allow me to stay on my knees for an extended period of time without getting uncomfortable. I have worn them for 9-hour working days without any issues with fit, adjustment, or comfort. They have great cushioning and are very comfortable, but in my opinion what really makes them better than most other knee pads on the market is the fact that they have two adjustable straps with slip buckles instead of one of the straps being Velcro . — Shannon Huett Get them from Amazon for $29.99+ (available in two styles). 21. An expandable garden hose to help you water your grass, the vegetables you planted and prayed will actually grow, and your flower bed without worrying about any kinks getting in the way. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "Have used this for about three weeks, watering flowers, grass and washing cars. Have used it almost every day in some way or another. It's very light, easy to maneuver, and doesn't kink. However, I think that's because I followed the directions on the box for how to unwind it for the first time. When I was first unraveling, it kinked in multiple places, so I had to carefully unravel and lay it out fully extended before I even hooked it up to the water source. Has been kink-free ever since." — Sean Cotter Get it from Amazon for $10.06+ (available in seven sizes). 22. An adjustable gardening bench complete with padding for your knees and handles on the sides to assist you in getting up from the crouched position you've likely been in for a *tad* too long while tending to your veggies. It can even be turned into a seat so you can take a true break! www.amazon.com Promising reviews: "This is great for the garden. It keeps my knees out of the stickers, and the padding is very comfortable, it helps me get up and down — it is easy to maneuver around the garden and in between the rows. I haven't tried sitting on it, but I'm heavy, and it feels very sturdy under me. Pockets deep enough for tools and seed packets, easy to remove and wash if necessary." — Cpt Dragon "I bought this for my mother as she had knee surgery, and now she can sit on it while working in her flower and vegetable boxes. Definitely will purchase it again." — Johnnette Murray Get it from Amazon for $23.99 . 23. A plant supporter that'll give your tomato plants and bushes a bit more support so they can grow big and tall — since they're powder-coated in green they wont' ruin your garden's *~aesthetic~*. www.amazon.com Promising review: "These plant supports each consist of two semi circles that fit together to encircle the plant. I have two snake plants that are getting taller and needed support. These plant stakes are working perfectly . They can easily be inserted into the soil to the desired height, and the green color obscures their appearance. My plants look prettier and stronger now that they are standing tall." — A.Consumer Get a pack of four from Amazon for $14.99+ (also available in an eight-pack). 24. A garden colander to fill up with all of the fruits and veggies you've worked so hard to grow from little seedlings — wash 'em off outside with the hose to prevent getting dirt all over your kitchen. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I got this for my elderly parents. They always put out a small garden. I thought this would be perfect for them to gather and carry their vegetables in. Another good part is you can rinse them in it, too! My mom said it was too pretty to use for that, but she uses it. It’s convenient!" — Samantha Bastin Get it from Amazon for $19.29+ (available in two colors). 25. A pack of seeds that contain, basically, any kind of vegetable you'd want to grow in your garden — beets, cucumbers, cabbage, butternut squash, and more. You've got a biiiiiiig salad in your future. Amazon, www.amazon.com Each pack includes 1,300+ seeds consisting of zucchini, eggplant, beet, pumpkin, butternut squash, cabbage, bok choy, cauliflower, broccoli, rapini rabe, celery, cucumber, kohlrabi, radish, bell pepper, cayenne pepper, okra, Brussels sprout, beefsteak tomato, and cherry tomato. Organo Republic is a small business! Promising review : "I purchased it for my mother as a gift and I absolutely love the product. Huge variety and very affordable price! The package looks great and each seed bag is individually labeled along with a QR that takes you directly to all the information you need pertaining to that type of vegetables. Love it." — V. G Get it from Amazon for $19.99+ (also available in a a variety of 15 and 25 veggie seeds). 26. A sturdy garden tool set so no matter what kind of planting plans you've got in your future, you'll be ready. Amazon The set includes a hand trowel, transplant trowel, and cultivator hand rake. Each tool has a nonslip ergonomic handle to make long hours of planting easier! Promising review: "Purchased these since several other brands/types that I've used over the years just bend when any pressure from digging is done. If you want something that can dig in regular soil rather than potting blend — these are for you." — Joe in MO Get it from Amazon for $22.80 (available in three colors). 27. Joyful Dirt concentrated plant food and fertilizer designed to be mixed into a watering vessel or sprinkled directly onto the soil to help plants grow bigger and faster. And! It's organic! www.amazon.com Joyful Dirt is a small business based in Portland, Oregon making organic, all-purpose plant food since 2013. Promising review: "I never write reviews but had to share what a great find this was! I have routinely killed every living plant I've ever brought home. Joyful Dirt has completely changed that. All my plants look full and healthy with little to no effort on my part! I am so amazed that for teacher gifts this year, I am giving terrariums and will include a shaker of Joyful Dirt to go with each. If you have any trouble keeping plants alive, this is the solution." — KB13 Get a bottle from Amazon for $19.95 . 28. A pack of bamboo garden stakes available in an array of thickness levels that'll support your plants and veggies as they grow. Reach for the sky, babies! www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "Highly recommend buying these bamboo sticks. I used them to make tomato cages and also to provide support for my climbing vines. They are long enough and quite sturdy. They also look natural. I do not like the sight of metal or plastic tomato cages in a garden. So these blend in harmoniously with all the other plants in my garden" — S R Get a 25-pack from Amazon for $21.11 . 29. A weather-resistant cedar pathway you can roll out alongside your prettiest garden bed or just anywhere you tend to walk so often the grass tends to get a bit torn up. Installation of a new walkway has *never* been this easy. www.amazon.com One reviewer even used the cedar pathway material to repurpose their outdoor lounge chairs ! Promising review: "We are using outdoors at an animal sanctuary. The cats love to sleep on them and they do keep the wetter pathways dry under your feet. They are lasting quite well and although not cheap by any means, they are standing up to cats and people walking on them all day long. They are surviving both rain and sun and wind. We will be purchasing more." — susan osako Get an 8-foot path from Amazon for $69.99 . 30. A vintage-style bike planter complete with three baskets you can fill with your favorite flowers and enjoy even if you haven't ridden a bicycle in over a decade. www.amazon.com Promising review: "I bought this for my mother, who has been an avid gardener for over 30 years. It was specifically a Mother's Day gift, but it really would be such a wonderful and thoughtful gift for anyone who likes to plant, garden, and accessorize with vintage charm . Its size is about to my knee (I'm 5-foot-6) and VERY sturdy. My mother has it outside on our porch for her herbs. It doesn't take up much space but can easily be indoors or outdoors. It's currently part of her outdoor patio furniture grouping and looks charming. I highly recommend this to anyone looking to bring a little smile to any planter or gardener in your life." — Jennifer J. Get it from Amazon for $51.99+ (available in black or bronze). 31. And The Complete Gardener's Guide by Simon Akeroyd — AKA the bible for plant parents. It explains how to sow, plant, and prune while also providing tips on selecting plants, protecting your plants, and designing your garden. www.amazon.com Promising review: "I bought a new home in the woods and haven’t really gardened before. The previous owners already had a very impressive garden. Me being new to the scene, I wanted to learn as much as possible to keep up my garden beautiful, fresh, and healthy. This book has everything a first timer like myself could need. From plans, designs, sowing, pruning etc. I was also excited about the fruit and vegetable section, as I plan to grow my own. I definitely recommend the Complete Gardener’s Guide book. It just arrived today and I’ve been flipping through bunny earring pages all night. Excited to prune my rose bushes tomorrow after reading the section on them." — QueenJ Get it from Amazon for $27 . Some reviews have been edited for length and/or clarity.
